passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(7) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > div > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > div > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(5) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > div > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(6) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > div > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(8) > iframe
